00019 class BrowseModel extends Galleria_Model_Collection
00020 {
00021 
00030     public function getPictures($cid)
00031     {
00032         $pdo = $this->_getConnection();
00033         if (Galleria_Auth::isLogged() && Galleria_Auth::getObject()->hasGroups()) {
00034             if (Galleria_Auth::getObject()->isInAdminGroup()) {
00035                 $sth = $pdo->prepare('SELECT DISTINCT pd.pid, pd.desc, pd.shown FROM galleria.picturedata AS pd WHERE pd.cid = ?');
00036                 $sth->execute(array($cid));
00037             } else {
00038                 $sth = $pdo->prepare('SELECT DISTINCT pd.pid, pd.desc FROM galleria.picturedata AS pd WHERE pd.cid = ? AND pd.shown = TRUE AND (pd.gid IS NULL OR pd.gid IN (' . $this->_prepareIn(Galleria_Auth::getObject()->getSQLGroups()) . '))');
00039                 $sth->execute(array_merge(array($cid), Galleria_Auth::getObject()->getSQLGroups()));
00040             }
00041         } else {
00042             $sth = $pdo->prepare('SELECT DISTINCT pd.pid, pd.desc FROM galleria.picturedata AS pd WHERE pd.cid = ? AND pd.shown = TRUE AND pd.gid IS NULL');
00043             $sth->execute(array($cid));
00044         }
00045         return $this->_fetchObjects($sth);
00046     }

00055     public function getCategories()
00056     {
00057         $usergroups = (Galleria_Auth::isLogged()) ? Galleria_Auth::getObject()->getUsergroups() : array();
00058         $pdo = $this->_getConnection();
00059         if (Galleria_Auth::isLogged() && Galleria_Auth::getObject()->hasGroups()) {
00060             if (Galleria_Auth::getObject()->isInAdminGroup()) {
00061                 $sth = $pdo->prepare('SELECT DISTINCT cl.cid AS id, cl.cpar AS parent, cl.name, cl.haspics FROM galleria.categorylist AS cl');
00062                 $sth->execute();
00063             } else {
00064                 $sth = $pdo->prepare('SELECT DISTINCT cl.cid AS id, cl.cpar AS parent, cl.name, cl.haspics FROM galleria.categorylist AS cl WHERE cl.gid IS NULL OR cl.gid IN (' . $this->_prepareIn(Galleria_Auth::getObject()->getSQLGroups()) . ')');
00065                 $sth->execute(Galleria_Auth::getObject()->getSQLGroups());
00066             }
00067         } else {
00068             $sth = $pdo->prepare('SELECT DISTINCT cl.cid AS id, cl.cpar AS parent, cl.name, cl.haspics FROM galleria.categorylist AS cl WHERE cl.gid IS NULL');
00069             $sth->execute();
00070         }
00071         return $this->_fetchObjects($sth);
00072     }

00082     public function getCatName($id)
00083     {
00084         $usergroups = (Galleria_Auth::isLogged()) ? Galleria_Auth::getObject()->getUsergroups() : array();
00085         $pdo = $this->_getConnection();
00086         if (Galleria_Auth::isLogged() && Galleria_Auth::getObject()->hasGroups()) {
00087             if (Galleria_Auth::getObject()->isInAdminGroup()) {
00088                 $sth = $pdo->prepare('SELECT c.name FROM galleria.categories AS c WHERE c.id = ?');
00089                 $state = $sth->execute(array($id));
00090             } else {
00091                 $sth = $pdo->prepare('SELECT DISTINCT cl.name FROM galleria.categorylist AS cl WHERE (cl.gid IS NULL OR cl.gid IN (' . $this->_prepareIn(Galleria_Auth::getObject()->getSQLGroups()) . ')) AND cl.cid = ?');
00092                 $state = $sth->execute(array_merge(Galleria_Auth::getObject()->getSQLGroups(), array($id)));
00093             }
00094         } else {
00095             $sth = $pdo->prepare('SELECT DISTINCT cl.name FROM galleria.categorylist AS cl WHERE (cl.gid IS NULL) AND cl.cid = ?');
00096             $state = $sth->execute(array($id));
00097         }
00098         return ($state) ? (($obj = $sth->fetchObject()) ? $obj->name : null) : null;
00099     }
